name: Dream Team
description:
Bertram the Brute receives his next mission: Escort billionaire's kid Whiny Walter through robot mutant territory.

Good thing Bertram is a cyborg that can't be hurt by anything. He is bullet- fire- and anvil-resistant. His only weakness is he can't jump. A slight oversight by his programmers. Who needs jumping when you're armed with your trusty arm blaster and a grappling hook?

Walter on the other hand, is a burden to have around. Literally. He doesn't even want to move by himself. But he has to be kept alive.

----

Controls:
WASD/Arrows: Move
Mouse: Aim
LMB: Fire arm blaster
RMB: Use grappling hook
Shift: Pick up/drop Walter

Made for Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive
